title: 2024–2025 Belgian government formation - Wikipedia
snippet: Incumbent Prime Minister Alexander De Croo announced his resignation and his party's leader Tom Ongena declared that Open Flemish Liberals and Democrats would not be a part of the next federal government. Bart De Wever was sworn in as prime minister on 3 February 2025.

title: Belgium: Right-wing strikes deal to lead new government – DW – 02/01/2025
snippet: 02/01/2025February 1, 2025 · Months of talks have resulted in a five-party coalition agreement to be led by the right-wing N-VA party's Bart De Wever. He is now set to become the country's first nationalist prime minister. https://p.dw.com/p/4pv3r ...

title: Belgium set for new government after months of negotiations | Reuters
snippet: By Bart H. MeijerJanuary 31, 202510:24 PM UTCUpdated January 31, 2025 · Bart De Wever, President of Flemish nationalist party N-VA, talks to the media after casting his vote for the Belgian general and regional elections and for the European ...

title: Belgium to form government after seven months of negotiations | Belgium | The Guardian
snippet: The coalition government will be led by the conservative New Flemish Alliance party’s Bart De Wever

title: Composition of the Belgian federal government | Belgium.be
snippet: Mr. Bart De Wever, Prime Minister Mr. David Clarinval, Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Employment, Economy and Agriculture
